TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Takimi, title = Takimi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Takimi} }

S.FORM: alang Takimi ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Umitan go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 87 buwan, 327 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 87% kyan ku 286 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 13% kyan ku 41 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun 78%, Amis 4%, Paywan 2%, Tayan 1%, Cou 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 2%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyahu' na Takimi hya' ga Likau-uan. tay 'llaw na Takimi hya' ga Tuapuu. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Takimi ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Takimi ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Umitan go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 87 bowan, 327 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 87% kyan ko 286 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 13% kyan ko 41 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon 78%, Amis 4%, Paywan 2%, Tayan 1%, Coo 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 2%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyaho' na Takimi hya' ga Likao-oan. tay 'llaw na Takimi hya' ga Toapoo. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Takimi ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
